annonstext:
Job Description

Do you love improving F2P mobile games based on data and insights? Are you passionate about data driven development and F2P design? Do you get excited about designing, managing and analysing experiments? Do you actively follow the fast changing mobile gaming market? Would you like to work with exceptionally talented professionals? Join us as a Product Manager at Ringtail Games!

RESPONSIBILITIES

	Drive product requirements and features based on deep understanding of F2P game design and engagement/monetization mechanics
	Work very closely with the Game Lead, Designers, UA and BI to support them in setting the vision and priorities for the game development
	Own the live operations by managing, analyzing, and balancing events and offers of the game
	Own the A/B testing process of the game allowing the team to validate hypotheses and translate the results into learnings that help steer our games into the right direction
	Bring an outside-in view to the team by benchmarking of competitors and identifying new and promising practices
	Own and analyze game metrics (acquisition, retention, engagement, monetization, virality) and proactively identify and implement optimizations to improve the player experience and core financial performance
	Educate others on F2P best practices and on new emerging F2P trends

REQUIREMENTS

	You have some years of experience working on a F2P live title with a proven record of improving game metrics
	You have a solid understanding of F2P economy and game design
	You have a strong ability to analyze data and strong Excel skills, experience with metrics-driven decision making
	You have strong written and verbal communication skills
	You love games (especially F2P)! You understand the different needs for a game in soft launch and for one that’s been live for years
	You are a self-starter and able to tackle problems independently
	You understand how modern user acquisition works and how it affects game metrics and direction of the game
	You are deeply interested in understanding players

GOOD TO HAVE 

	Knowledge of SQL
	Experience in statistical analysis
